definition: component in Chinese characters, occurring in 青, 毒, 素 etc/see also 青字頭|青字头[qing1 zi4 tou2]
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
to order/to enjoin/to charge/to instruct sb to finish sth
to take responsibility/to bear responsibility/to be responsible
editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
to charge (an entity) with (a task)/to assign (sb) the task of

sentences.english: To do my duty, for the good of mankind in general.
sentences.chinese: 要善盡職責，爲全人類謀求福祉。

sentences.english: My name is Li Ze You, and I'm from English major 073.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字是慄責你，我從英語專業073。

sentences.english: Am I responsible for the dirty air in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，我是否該爲北京污濁的空氣擔一份責？

sentences.english: Blame others don't leave three points, as everybody with people, leave some room for) with yourself.
sentences.chinese: 責人不必苛盡，留三分餘地與人，留些肚量與己。

sentences.english: So, to achieve environmental protection, every one should be responsible.
sentences.chinese: 所苡，崾做到保護環境，亽亽冇責。

sentences.english: Active not invited to do, to stay third room with people, to stay and have some humility.
sentences.chinese: 責人不必苛盡，留三分餘地與人，留些肚量與己。

sentences.english: He was torn between his duty and his better instincts.
sentences.chinese: 他在選擇盡職責和憑直覺更應當怎麼做之間犯難了。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to handle/to take care of/to punish
